en.cookie_essential_desc_cookie: Necessary cookies help make a website usable by enabling basic functions like page navigation and access to secure areas of the website. The website cannot function properly without these cookies.
en.cookie_performance_desc_cookie: These cookies are used to enhance the performance and functionality of our websites but are non-essential to their use. For example it stores your preferred language or the region that you are in.
en.cookie_analytics_desc_cookie: We use analytics cookies to help us measure how users interact with website content
en.cookie_marketing_desc_cookie: These cookies are used to make advertising messages more relevant to you and your interests. The intention is to display ads that are relevant and engaging for the individual user and thereby more valuable for publishers and third party advertisers.

you need to present an international driving licence together with your original driving licence in order to rent a vehicle.
Driving licences with non-Roman characters or licences belonging to countries outside the EU must be accompanied by an international licence or an official translation.

Additional driver:

Insurance:
Insurance includes collision insurance.
Please note that customer negligence is never included in the Super Collision Damage Waiver (SCDW).
